DataSource.Query: SELECT Version FROM Win32_Product WHERE Name='Veeam Agent for Microsoft Windows' OR Name='Veeam Endpoint Backup'

DataSource.ScriptBody:
Dim SourceID, ManagedEntityID, TargetComputer Dim oAPI, oArgs, oShell, oDiscoveryData, RegistryValue, LicenseValue
Set oShell = CreateObject("WScript.Shell") Set oAPI = CreateObject("MOM.ScriptAPI") Set oArgs = WScript.Arguments
SourceID = oArgs(0) ManagedEntityID = oArgs(1)
RegistryValue = oShell.RegRead("HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Veeam\Veeam Agent for Microsoft Windows\license\licensemode")
Select Case RegistryValue Case 0 LicenseValue = "Free Edition" Case 1 LicenseValue = "Server Edition" Case 2 LicenseValue = "Workstation Edition" Case Else LicenseValue = "Missing" End Select
Dim oBag Set oBag = oAPI.CreatePropertyBag() Call oBag.AddValue("Value", LicenseValue) Call oAPI.Return(oBag)

ColumnInfo.Name: Offset In Minutes From Greenwich Time

DisplayString.Name: Inside Technologies - Veeam Agent Management Pack
DisplayString.Description: Management Pack to monitor and manage Veeam Agent for Windows/Linux and Veeam Endpoint Backup, created by Silvio Di Benedetto. For feedback and support visit Inside Technologies portal on GitHub.

DisplayString.Name: Populate Veeam Agent Group Windows
DisplayString.Description: This discovery rule populates the group 'Veeam Agents Group Windows'

DisplayString.Name: Populate Veeam Agent Group Linux
DisplayString.Description: This discovery rule populates the group 'Veeam Agent Group Linux'

DisplayString.Name: State Windows
DisplayString.Description: List of all computer with Veeam Agent for Windows installed

DisplayString.Name: Veeam Agent Service Stopped
DisplayString.Description: Veeam Agent for Microsoft Windows is not running

DisplayString.Name: Veeam Endpoint Service Stopped
DisplayString.Description: Veeam Endpoint for Microsoft Windows is not running

DisplayString.Name: Veeam Agent Monitor Service Linux
DisplayString.Description: Veeam Agent for Linux Service (veeamservice) is a service responsible for managing all tasks and resources in Veeam Agent for Linux. The veeamservice component is registered as a daemon in the Linux OS upon the product installation. The service is started automatically when you start the OS, and runs in the background.

DisplayString.Name: Veeam Agent Monitor Service Linux
DisplayString.Description: Veeam Agent for Linux Service (veeamservice) is a service responsible for managing all tasks and resources in Veeam Agent for Linux. The veeamservice component is registered as a daemon in the Linux OS upon the product installation. The service is started automatically when you start the OS, and runs in the background.
